TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Route extends System.Web.Routing.RouteBase

summary.span: Provides properties and methods for defining a route and for obtaining information about the route.

span.span: Provides properties and methods for defining a route and for obtaining information about the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，可指定如何路由在 ASP.NET 应用程序中处理。The class enables you to specify how routing is processed in an ASP.NET application. 你创建对象每个你想要将映射到可以处理的类的 URL 模式请求对应于该模式。You create a object for each URL pattern that you want to map to a class that can handle requests that correspond to that pattern. 然后，你添加到的路由集合。You then add the route to the collection. 当应用程序收到请求时，ASP.NET 路由循环访问中的路由集合以找到与 URL 模式匹配的第一个路由。When the application receives a request, ASP.NET routing iterates through the routes in the collection to find the first route that matches the pattern of the URL. 设置URL 模式的属性。Set the property to a URL pattern. URL 模式由 HTTP 请求中的应用程序名称之后的段组成。The URL pattern consists of segments that come after the application name in an HTTP request. 例如，在 URL 中`http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`，模式将应用于`products/show/beverages`。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`, the pattern applies to `products/show/beverages`. 有三个模式网段，如`{controller}/{action}/{id}`，与 URL 匹配`http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`。A pattern with three segments, such as `{controller}/{action}/{id}`, matches the URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`. 由分隔每个段`/`字符。Each segment is delimited by the `/` character. 当将一个段括在大括号 (`{`和`}`)，该分段是 URL 参数。When a segment is enclosed in braces (`{` and `}`), the segment is referred to a URL parameter. ASP.NET 路由请求中检索值，并将其分配给 URL 参数。ASP.NET routing retrieves the value from the request and assigns it to the URL parameter. 在前面的示例中，URL 参数`action`分配的值`show`。In the previous example, the URL parameter `action` is assigned the value `show`. 如果段不括在大括号，则值视为文字值。If the segment is not enclosed in braces, the value is treated as a literal value. 设置属性包括在从 URL 或设置不参数化的其他值在 URL 中缺少参数，则使用值的对象。Set the property to a object that includes values that are used if a parameter is missing from the URL or to set additional values that are not parameterized in the URL. 设置属性对象，其中包含为正则表达式的值或对象。Set the property to a object that contains values that are either regular expressions or objects. 这些值用于确定参数值是否有效。These values are used to determine whether a parameter value is valid. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象，并将其添加到属性。The following example shows how to create a object and add it to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

value.span: 包含参数名称和表达式的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameter names and expressions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够限制可接受的处理的路由的 URL 参数值。The property enables you to limit acceptable values for a URL parameter that is processed by a route. 你分配对象传递给属性。You assign a object to the property. 在每个元素对象包含的名称的参数和以下项之一：Each element in the object contains the name of a parameter and one of the following: - 一个定义正则表达式的字符串。A string that defines a regular expression. 正则表达式不区分大小写。The regular expression is case-insensitive. - 实现的对象接口，并且包括方法。An object that implements the interface and that includes a method. 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface. 你可以包含的实例类作为约束以指定的 HTTP 谓词的可接受的路由。You can include an instance of the class as a constraint to specify which HTTP verbs are acceptable for the route. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象，并将， ，和属性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)] 下面的示例演示对象，其属性包含一个名为参数`httpMethod`与实例的值的类。The following example shows a object whose property contains a parameter named `httpMethod` with an instance of the class for the value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets custom values that are passed to the route handler, but which are not used to determine whether the route matches a URL pattern.

span.span: Gets or sets custom values that are passed to the route handler, but which are not used to determine whether the route matches a URL pattern.
An object that contains custom values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用检索或分配未用于确定路由是否与 URL 模式匹配的值与路由关联的属性。You use the property to retrieve or assign values associated with the route that are not used to determine whether a route matches a URL pattern. 这些值会传递到路由处理程序，以便用于处理请求。These values are passed to the route handler, where they can be used for processing the request. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象，并将， ，和属性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.

span.span: Gets or sets the values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.

value.span: 包含参数名称和默认值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameter names and default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够设置 URL 参数的值，如果 URL 不包含为该参数的段。The property enables you to set the value for a URL parameter if the URL does not contain a segment for that parameter. 你分配对象传递给属性。You assign a object to the property. 在每个元素对象包含的参数和要使用如果参数是缺少的值的名称。Each element in the object contains the name of a parameter and the value to use if the parameter is missing. 你可以包括中未定义的参数的默认值作为段的属性。You can include a default value for a parameter that is not defined in the property as a segment. 当 ASP.NET 路由处理请求时，此默认值是始终传递给路由处理程序。When ASP.NET routing handles a request, this default value is always passed to the route handler. 构造的 URL 并将包含未作为段定义的默认参数的值，路由将仅被视为匹配如果你提供的值与匹配的路由的默认值。When you construct a URL and you include a value for a default parameter that is not defined as a segment, the route will only be considered a match if the value that you provided matches the default value for the route. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象，并将， ，和属性。The following example shows how to create a object and set the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.ctor/VB/Global.asax#1)] 下面的示例演示对象，其属性包含一个参数，不是中的模式的一部分属性。The following example shows a object whose property contains a parameter that is not part of the pattern in the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the URL pattern for the route.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL pattern for the route.

value.span: 用于匹配到 URL 的路由的模式。

span.span: The pattern for matching the route to a URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将值赋给属性，`/`字符被解释为分隔符时分析该 URL。When you assign a value to the property, the `/` character is interpreted as a delimiter when the URL is parsed. 使用大括号 (`{}`) 来定义变量被称为*URL 参数*。Use braces (`{}`) to define a variable that is referred to as a *URL parameter*. 从 URL 中的匹配段的值分配给 URL 参数。The value from the matching segment in the URL is assigned to the URL parameter. 中的任何值不括在大括号中的属性将被视为文字的常量。Any values in the property that are not enclosed in braces are treated as literal constants. `?`中不允许使用字符属性。The `?` character is not allowed in the property. 必须按分隔符或文本常量分隔每个 URL 段。Each URL segment must be separated by either a delimiter or literal constant. 你可以使用`{{`或`}}`为转义大括号字符的字符。You can use `{{` or `}}` as escape characters for a brace character. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置类构造函数中的属性。The following example shows how to set the property in the class constructor. 模式的第一条线段和接下来的两段的 URL 参数包含的文本值"类别"。The pattern contains the literal value "Category" for the first segment and URL parameters for the next two segments. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

exception.span: Any of the following: - The value starts with ~ or /.

span.span: Any of the following: - The value starts with ~ or /.
- The value contains a ?
character.

exception.span: - The catch-all parameter is not last.

span.span: - The catch-all parameter is not last.

exception.span: URL segments are not separated by a delimiter or a literal constant.

span.span: URL segments are not separated by a delimiter or a literal constant.
